name: Ubisoft Game Data File
summary: Learn about .FORGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The PC versions of many Ubisoft video games use the FORGE file format to compress and package game data. Even with their embedded files compressed, FORGE files are quite large. Most FORGE files have a file size of over 200 MB.

instructions: While FORGE files cannot be opened, ARchive_neXt and Maki are both Windows utilities that allow players to extract game assets from FORGE files. ARchive_neXt works with all FORGE files except those used by Rainbow Six Siege, while Maki works with Assassin's Creed and Assassin's Creed 2 FORGE files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
